---
id: CancelCurrentPending订单
title: Cancel the Current Pending 订单
sidebar_label: Cancel the Current Pending 订单
sidebar_position: 8
description: /spot/v4/open-order
---

**类型:** DELETE

**描述:** `/spot/v4/open-order`

### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

> **注意:** The parameters should be placed in the request 请求体 in the form of JSON.

### 参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必需 | 默认值值 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `symbol` | 字符串 | Yes |  | Trading pair, if not filled in, represents all |
| `biz类型` | 字符串 | Yes |  | SPOT, LEVER |
| `side` | 字符串 | Yes |  | BUY, SELL |

### 响应示例

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "字符串",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {}
}
```
